short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly download CRX files as zip or crx format. The ultimate tool for Chrome extension management and extraction.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CRX File Downloader Pro is a powerful tool designed for developers, extension enthusiasts, and power users who need to download Chrome extensions in CRX or ZIP format. Whether you need to backup an extension or extract its contents, CRX File Downloader Pro makes it easy to download and manage your favorite extensions with just a click. With an intuitive interface and easy-to-use options, you can quickly download, convert, and manage CRX files.

Features:

Download extensions as CRX or ZIP files with a single click.
Convert CRX files to ZIP format for easier manipulation.
Easy-to-use interface with minimal setup required.
Fast and reliable downloads.
Full support for popular Chrome and Edge extensions.
Rate the app and show your support by purchasing a coffee for the developer!
Why Choose CRX File Downloader Pro?

Simple & Efficient: Quickly download extensions for personal use or development.
Free & Open: No hidden fees or ads, just a simple tool to help you manage your extensions.
Developer Friendly: Ideal for developers looking to explore or extract files from extensions.
